notifications.text:
Please note the upcoming release coming on June 8th, 2017. The appliation will be updated between 6:00 and 8:00 CET
Be sure to not maintain any kind of data during this period.

notifications.text: The all new accessories manial is now available and can be downloaded @Accessiroes Editor > Option > User Manual.
